package:
voronoi_planner 0.1.0
A path planner library, that searches a path from robot position to given goal on generalized Voronoi diagram (GVD) which is made up of regions around obstacles on costmap.
Roman Fedorenko /maintainer> BSD
Roman Fedorenko http://wiki.ros.org/voronoi_planner
catkin
angles costmap_2d dynamic_reconfigure geometry_msgs nav_core nav_msgs pluginlib roscpp tf dynamicvoronoi
costmap_2d dynamic_reconfigure geometry_msgs nav_core nav_msgs pluginlib roscpp tf dynamicvoronoi
